p: Phylogenetic analyses showed that all sequences obtained in this study clustered with the MVi/Ibadan.NGA/0.97/1 genotype B3 sequence with a bootstrap value greater than 90% ( Fig 2). A phylogenetic tree of the sub-group to which the Cameroon strains belong is shown in Fig 3. All strains belonged to cluster B3.1 with a bootstrap value greater than 90%.
